name: Spakoyno: Back to the USSR 2.0
description: High crime rates, corruption and a change of morals… Can he survive the new society?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 715 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

reviews.review_text: Weirdest VN I’ve ever played, and not in a good way. I got this because I saw Doc Brown and because I like to give a chance to VNs from various countries. And well, it’s bad. But to be really honest, I’ve played worst games? So it’s bad, but not atrocious… I guess. The plot is weak and doesn’t make much sense, the art style is bad, BGs were more or less, BGM was annoying sometimes. The characters felt plain, there’s no development. Also those bears floating on balloons on the menu screen creeped me out, I don’t know why.   3/10.
Despite others' reviews.. I find this game fun & enjoyable.. Weird storyline but still playable Easy to get achievements ( You need to do 5 walkthroughs)  7/10
The story doesn't make any sense at all ...and then it's suddenly over.
very nice game, with cards! would play again!
